chat_history.message:
Hello, my iPhone 12 is experiencing the following problem:

Hello, my order is indicated with a confirmation email sent. However, I haven't received anything.
Knowing that this is the first time I'm ordering on your platform, I don't know how to do it.
It's a gift for my daughter and her birthday is approaching at a great pace, not counting the significant amount. 
Thank you for your urgent response

Thank you for your help,

Hi there,

The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered. 

We have asked the customer to look for their package in case it was delivered to a neighbor or family member. If they can't find the package, we asked them to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID, ---- ONLY IF THE ORDER IS AN IPHONE 12/13/14 (to remove) --- along with a proof of address.

Dear Backcare,

We have updated our logistics partner regarding this issue. In the meantime, please assist the customer in providing a handwritten CND and pictures of the customer's ID.

Please also assist the customer to complete the CND from DPD. We have attached the template in this message.

Regards,
Xt

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the POD. If the customer wishes to contest, please send us the necessary documents. 

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

The customer finally received his package.

Thank you for your involvement.

Regards,
Pélagie from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this. Thank you.

Regards,
JY
